question: According to the video, what is one of the biggest differences between Protestants and Catholics?
options: How they relate to Mary, the mother of our Lord
answer: How they relate to Mary, the mother of our Lord

question: What is the rosary primarily directed towards?
answer: Mary

question: What does "Theotocos" literally mean?
answer: Godbearer

question: When was the title "Theotocos" affirmed at the Council of Ephesus?
What does the doctrine of Perpetual Virginity claim about Mary?
options: She remained a virgin only until her death
She had no other children besides Jesus
She never consummated her marriage to Joseph
She was a virgin only until Jesus was born
answer: She never consummated her marriage to Joseph

question: Which biblical passage appears to contradict the doctrine of Perpetual Virginity?
answer: Matthew 1:25

question: What does the Immaculate Conception refer to?
options: Mary being conceived without original sin
The miraculous conception of Jesus by the Holy Spirit
Mary's sinless life after Jesus's birth
answer: Mary being conceived without original sin

question: Which theologian helped make the Immaculate Conception popular in the 13th century?
answer: Duns Scotus

question: When was the Assumption of Mary declared a dogma?
What does the Assumption of Mary teach?
options: Mary died and was buried like other humans
Mary was taken up body and soul into heaven
Mary's soul went to heaven but her body remained on earth
Mary was resurrected after three days
answer: Mary was taken up body and soul into heaven

question: In which heretical text did the assumption of Mary first appear?
answer: Book of Mary's Repose

question: Which of the following is NOT one of the four Marian dogmas?
answer: Queen of Heaven

question: What is a Marian apparition?
options: A belief that Mary appeared to people and gave special revelations
A feast day dedicated to Mary
answer: A belief that Mary appeared to people and gave special revelations

question: What is "Our Lady of Guadalupe" an example of?
answer: A geographically specific Marian apparition

question: According to the video, when did the age of public revelation to the whole church end?
options: With the death of the last apostle
With the closing of the canon
answer: With the death of the last apostle

question: What do Protestants believe is the only reliably preserved revelation we have today?
options: The teachings of the church fathers
answer: Scripture alone

question: Which method do some Catholics use to justify Marian doctrines through typological interpretation?
options: Comparing Mary to the Ark of the Covenant
Comparing Mary to the High Priest
answer: Comparing Mary to the Ark of the Covenant

question: According to Romans 3:23, what does the passage say about all people?
options: Only Jesus and Mary are sinless
Original sin affects everyone except Mary
All have sinned and fall short of the glory of God
answer: All have sinned and fall short of the glory of God

question: What does the video say about Paul's references to Mary in his writings?
options: Paul never even mentions her by name
Paul mentions her in every epistle
answer: Paul never even mentions her by name

question: Which second century apologist called Jesus "the only blameless and righteous man"?
answer: Justin Martyr

question: What did Clement of Alexandria say about sin?
options: Only Jesus and Mary are sinless
Sin is natural and common to all, and only the Word is sinless
answer: Sin is natural and common to all, and only the Word is sinless

question: What did St. Basil the Great say about Mary?
options: She remained a virgin her entire life
Christ had to redeem Mary from the sin of doubt
answer: Christ had to redeem Mary from the sin of doubt

question: What did Tertullian claim about Mary in Matthew 12?
options: She is a figure for the unbelieving synagogue
She is a figure for the believing church
answer: She is a figure for the unbelieving synagogue

question: What did Origen teach about Mary?
options: She was sinless and did not need redemption
She was scandalized and sinned, had to be redeemed like everyone else
She remained a virgin only until Jesus was born
She was assumed into heaven without dying
answer: She was scandalized and sinned, had to be redeemed like everyone else

question: What did St. Epiphanius say about what happened to Mary?
options: No one knows what happened to Mary
answer: No one knows what happened to Mary

question: When did perpetual virginity become the default view?
answer: Third and fourth centuries

question: What did Pope Pius XII say in 1953 about Mary?
options: Mary should be honored but not venerated
Nothing more sweet than to worship, venerate, invoke, and praise the mother of God
Mary is part of the Trinity
answer: Nothing more sweet than to worship, venerate, invoke, and praise the mother of God

question: What did St. Bernardine say about Mary?
options: Mary was a sinner like everyone else
Mary was raised to a sort of equality with the divine persons by almost infinity of graces
Mary is just like other saints
answer: Mary was raised to a sort of equality with the divine persons by almost infinity of graces

question: What did St. Bernard claim about Mary?
options: God created the whole world for Mary
Mary should not be prayed to
answer: God created the whole world for Mary

question: What did St. Bonaventure say about the world's existence?
answer: It depends on Mary's will

question: What did St. Bernardine claim about why God preserved man after Adam's sin?
options: Because of the promise to Abraham
On account of his most singular love for Mary
Because of the coming of Christ
Because of his love for all humanity
answer: On account of his most singular love for Mary

question: According to the video, what is the Protoevangelium of James?
options: A second century anonymous apocryphal text
answer: A second century anonymous apocryphal text

question: What does the video conclude about Mary?
options: She is the most blessed among women, beloved mother of our Lord, but a sinner nonetheless
She was sinless and equal to Jesus
She is part of the Trinity
answer: She is the most blessed among women, beloved mother of our Lord, but a sinner nonetheless

question: What is a scapular?
options: A piece of cloth worn by Catholics, often with images of Mary, believed to confer special grace
answer: A piece of cloth worn by Catholics, often with images of Mary, believed to confer special grace

question: What does "Mediatrix" mean?
options: A mediator between God and humanity
answer: A mediator between God and humanity

question: What is "Co-Redemptrix"?
options: A current dogma of the Catholic Church
A proposed title for Mary meaning she is co-redeemer with Christ, not yet dogmatized
answer: A proposed title for Mary meaning she is co-redeemer with Christ, not yet dogmatized

question: What is typological extrapolation?
options: A method of interpreting Scripture where Old Testament types are seen as pointing to Mary
answer: A method of interpreting Scripture where Old Testament types are seen as pointing to Mary
